net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.soot

Class PostBuildScriptHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.soot.PostBuildScriptHelper

  • public class PostBuildScriptHelper
extends Object
    Utility object used by post-build hook scripts.

    See src/main/test-integration/projects/.../postbuild.groovy scripts.

    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Julien Nicoulaud
    See Also:
    maven-invoker-plugin post-build script invocation

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected File baseDirectory
      The absolute path to the base directory of the test project.
      static String BUILD_LOG_FILE
      The name of the build log file.
      protected Map context
      The storage of key-value pairs used to pass data from the pre-build hook script to the post-build hook script.
      protected File localRepositoryPath
      The absolute path to the local repository used for the Maven invocation on the test project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PostBuildScriptHelper(File baseDirectory, File localRepositoryPath, Map context)
      Build a new PostBuildScriptHelper instance.
